content.hint: A scheduled meeting with someone
content.explanation: An appointment is an arrangement to meet someone at a particular time and place.
content.contextSentence: I have a dental appointment next Tuesday at 3 PM.

content.hint: The natural world around us
content.explanation: The environment refers to the surroundings or conditions in which a person, animal, or plant lives.
content.contextSentence: We should all do more to protect the environment from pollution.

content.hint: A chance for something positive to happen
content.explanation: An opportunity is a favorable time or situation for doing something you want to do.
content.contextSentence: Moving to a new city gave me the opportunity to start fresh.

content.hint: Not able to occur or be done
content.explanation: Impossible means not possible to do or achieve.
content.contextSentence: Without a ticket, it's impossible to enter the concert hall.

content.hint: An exciting or unusual experience
content.explanation: An adventure is an exciting or dangerous experience that is typically bold or risky.
content.contextSentence: Our hiking trip through the mountains was quite an adventure.

content.hint: The knowledge you get from doing a job or activity
content.explanation: Experience refers to the knowledge or skill acquired by a period of practical experience of something.
content.contextSentence: She has a lot of experience working in customer service.

content.hint: A special event to mark an important occasion
content.explanation: A celebration is a social gathering or enjoyable activity intended to celebrate something.
content.contextSentence: They organized a big celebration for their wedding anniversary.

content.hint: An idea or plan put forward for consideration
content.explanation: A suggestion is an idea or plan put forward for consideration.
content.contextSentence: Do you have any suggestions for where we should go for dinner?

content.hint: A film or program providing facts about a subject
content.explanation: A documentary is a film or television program that provides a factual report on a particular subject.
content.contextSentence: We watched an interesting documentary about marine life.

content.hint: Something successful that you did with effort
content.explanation: An achievement is something that has been accomplished successfully through effort, skill, or courage.
content.contextSentence: Graduating from university was a major achievement for her.

content.hint: Evoking admiration through size, quality, or skill
content.explanation: Something impressive causes admiration because it is very good, large, or shows great skill.
content.contextSentence: His knowledge of foreign languages is very impressive.

content.hint: The power to affect someone's beliefs or actions
content.explanation: Influence is the capacity to have an effect on the character, development, or behavior of someone or something.
content.contextSentence: Parents have a significant influence on their children's behavior.

content.hint: To focus all your attention on something
content.explanation: To concentrate means to focus one's attention or mental effort on a particular object or activity.
content.contextSentence: I find it difficult to concentrate when there's a lot of noise.

content.hint: Important or noticeable
content.explanation: Significant means sufficiently great or important to be worthy of attention; noteworthy.
content.contextSentence: There has been a significant increase in the number of students learning online.

content.hint: Feeling ashamed or awkward
content.explanation: Embarrassed describes feeling awkward, self-conscious, or ashamed about something.
content.contextSentence: He was embarrassed when he fell in front of everyone.

content.hint: To take part in an activity or event
content.explanation: To participate means to take part in an activity or event with others.
content.contextSentence: All students are encouraged to participate in the discussion.

content.hint: A suggestion about what someone should do or choose
content.explanation: A recommendation is advice telling someone what the best thing to do is.
content.contextSentence: He gave me a recommendation for a good restaurant.

content.hint: The movement of people or goods from one place to another
content.explanation: Transportation is the movement of people or goods from one place to another.
content.contextSentence: Public transportation in the city is very convenient.

content.hint: A feeling or belief that you can do something well or succeed at something
content.explanation: Confidence is the feeling or belief that one can rely on someone or something; firm trust.
content.contextSentence: She spoke with confidence during her presentation.

content.hint: Something that you give or do to help something be successful
content.explanation: A contribution is something that you give or do to help make something successful.
content.contextSentence: Her contribution to the project was very valuable.

content.hint: Activities that amuse or interest people
content.explanation: Entertainment is shows, movies, television, or other performances or activities that entertain people.
content.contextSentence: They provided entertainment for the guests at the party.

content.hint: Able to change or be changed easily according to the situation
content.explanation: Flexible means able to change or be changed easily according to the situation.
content.contextSentence: You need to be flexible if you want to travel a lot.

content.hint: A group of people living in the same place or having a particular characteristic in common
content.explanation: A community is a group of people who live in the same area or have a particular interest in common.
content.contextSentence: The community organized a festival for everyone.

content.hint: A duty to take care of something or someone
content.explanation: Responsibility is the state or fact of having a duty to deal with something or of having control over someone.
content.contextSentence: Taking care of a pet is a big responsibility.

content.hint: The process of getting something ready for use or for a particular purpose
content.explanation: Preparation is the action or process of making something ready for use or for getting ready for some occasion, test, or duty.
content.contextSentence: Good preparation is important before an exam.

content.hint: A person who offers to do something without being paid
content.explanation: A volunteer is someone who does something, especially helping other people, willingly and without being forced or paid to do it.
content.contextSentence: She works as a volunteer at the animal shelter every weekend.
